oauth_or_email.name: oauth_or_email
oauth_or_email.value: ((oauth_provider IS NOT NULL) AND (oauth_id IS NOT NULL)) OR ((email IS NOT NULL) AND (password_hash IS NOT NULL))

public.popular_content.definition: SELECT id, type, title, original_title, slug, synopsis, poster_url, backdrop_url, trailer_url, release_date, year, duration_minutes, tmdb_id, average_rating, total_ratings, total_views, created_at, updated_at, COALESCE(total_ratings::numeric * average_rating, 0::numeric) AS popularity_score FROM content c ORDER BY (COALESCE(total_ratings::numeric * average_rating, 0::numeric)) DESC
public.popular_content.name: popular_content

public.upcoming_watchparties.definition: SELECT wp.id, wp.created_by, wp.content_id, wp.season_id, wp.episode_id, wp.name, wp.description, wp.is_public, wp.max_participants, wp.platform_id, wp.platform_url, wp.scheduled_at, wp.started_at, wp.ended_at, wp.status, wp.current_position_timestamp, wp.is_playing, wp.leader_user_id, wp.created_at, wp.updated_at, u.username AS creator_username, c.title AS content_title, sp.name AS platform_name, count(wpp.id) AS participant_count FROM watchparties wp JOIN users u ON wp.created_by = u.id JOIN content c ON wp.content_id = c.id JOIN streaming_platforms sp ON wp.platform_id = sp.id LEFT JOIN watchparty_participants wpp ON wp.id = wpp.watchparty_id AND wpp.status::text = 'confirmed'::text WHERE wp.status::text = 'scheduled'::text AND wp.scheduled_at > now() GROUP BY wp.id, u.username, c.title, sp.name
public.upcoming_watchparties.name: upcoming_watchparties
